prompts.title: Prompt Generation
prompts.description: Generate detailed prompts or specialized prompts for Claude AI

detailedPrompt.title: Generate Detailed Prompt
detailedPrompt.description: Enter a simple description, AI will generate a complete prompt in your chosen format
detailedPrompt.plainTextDesc: üìù Generate structured detailed prompt with guiding questions
detailedPrompt.jsonDesc: üìã Generate JSON prompt with complete structure and required fields
detailedPrompt.inputLabel: Brief description of the topic you want to create a prompt for:
detailedPrompt.inputPlaceholder:
Enter brief description...

Examples:
- explain pod in k8s in detail
- write marketing email for new product
- analyze monthly sales data
- create JavaScript function for sorting array
- explain machine learning for beginners
detailedPrompt.resultDesc: üí° This {{format}} can be used directly with AI systems or copy individual fields
detailedPrompt.resultDescPlain: üí° This prompt can be used directly with ChatGPT or other AI

claudePrompt.title: Generate Prompt for Claude
claudePrompt.description: Enter your request, AI will generate an optimized prompt to send to Claude
claudePrompt.inputLabel: Request/Task you want Claude to perform:
claudePrompt.inputPlaceholder:
Enter detailed request...

Examples:
- Write a Python function to process CSV data
- Explain machine learning concepts for beginners
- Create an HTML/CSS landing page for tech startup
- Analyze and optimize JavaScript code snippet
- Write professional email to customers
claudePrompt.resultDesc: ü§ñ This prompt is optimized for use with Claude AI. You can copy and paste it directly into Claude.

todoTasks.title: Generate Todos & Tasks for AI Agent
todoTasks.description: Enter a simple request, AI will convert it into specific todos and tasks that AI agents can execute automatically and efficiently
todoTasks.inputPlaceholder:
Enter task for AI agent to perform...

Examples:
- Analyze and improve React application performance
- Automatically refactor code to follow best practices
- Create complete test cases for API endpoints
- Optimize database queries and indexes
- Implement CI/CD pipeline with automated testing
todoTasks.generateButton: Generate Todos & Tasks for AI Agent
todoTasks.resultLabel: Todos & Tasks List for AI Agent:
todoTasks.resultDesc: ü§ñ This list includes todos and tasks optimized for AI agents. Each task is described in detail with clear instructions so AI can execute automatically and accurately.

capacity.title: DDL Capacity Analysis
capacity.description: AI automatically calculates average and maximum record sizes, estimating total database capacity

workflowMode.title: Analysis Mode
workflowMode.description: Choose the capacity analysis method that fits your needs

classic.title: Quick Analysis
classic.description: Single-step analysis, fast but may be less accurate

input.title: DDL Schema Information
input.description: AI will automatically analyze and calculate average and maximum record sizes
input.recordCountWarningSmall: ‚ö†Ô∏è Very small record count may give inaccurate results
input.recordCountWarningLarge: üìä Very large record count - analysis may take longer
input.multiCallDesc: Detailed analysis with multiple separate AI calls (more accurate, takes more time)
input.singleCallDesc: Quick analysis with single AI call (faster, less detailed)
input.multiCallNote: üîÑ Multi-call mode will automatically retry every 5 seconds until successful. The system will not stop until analysis is complete.

progress.title: Analysis Progress
progress.retryNote: üîÑ System is automatically retrying (every 5 seconds) until successful. Please be patient...

step1.title: Step 1: Input DDL Schema
step1.description: Enter DDL schema to start analyzing database structure

step2.title: Step 2: Review and Edit Structure
step2.description: AI has analyzed the DDL structure. You can review and edit before calculating capacity

errors.invalidRecordCount: Please enter a valid record count.
errors.missingApiKey: Please go to Settings to enter ChatGPT API Key.
errors.jsonFormatError: AI returned incorrectly formatted result. System automatically retried every 5 seconds but still failed.
errors.authError: API authentication error. Please check API Key in Settings.
errors.rateLimitError: API rate limit exceeded. System will automatically retry every 5 seconds until successful.
errors.timeoutError: Connection timeout. System automatically retries every 5 seconds until successful.
errors.networkError: Network connection error. System will automatically retry every 5 seconds until successful.
errors.serverError: Server experiencing issues. System automatically retries every 5 seconds until successful.
errors.switchMethodHint: If you still encounter errors, try switching to 'Single AI Call' to increase success rate.

success.detailedAnalysisComplete: Completed detailed analysis with multiple AI calls.
success.structureAnalysisDesc: Analyzed {{tableCount}} tables with {{fieldCount}} fields. You can review and edit before calculation.
success.threeStepComplete: Completed 3-step capacity analysis with high precision.
success.copiedDesc: {{format}} content has been copied to clipboard.

results.title: Capacity Analysis Report
results.description: Record size and total capacity estimation

noResult.title: Enter DDL schema for AI automatic analysis
noResult.description: System will calculate average and maximum record sizes, then estimate total database capacity

fieldAnalysisReport.title: Detailed Field Analysis Report
fieldAnalysisReport.description: Detailed capacity analysis, storage efficiency and optimization recommendations for each field

optimizationRecommendations.title: Field Optimization Recommendations
optimizationRecommendations.highOverheadRecommendation: Field "{{fieldName}}" has high overhead ({{percent}}%). Consider optimizing data type.
optimizationRecommendations.largeSizeRecommendation: Field "{{fieldName}}" has large size ({{size}}). Consider compression or separation.
optimizationRecommendations.variableSizeRecommendation: Field "{{fieldName}}" has high size variation. Consider using VARCHAR instead of CHAR.
optimizationRecommendations.nullableFieldsRecommendation: Table has many nullable fields ({{nullableCount}}/{{totalCount}}). Consider reordering columns to optimize null bitmap.
optimizationRecommendations.overheadFieldsRecommendation: {{highOverheadCount}}/{{totalCount}} fields have high overhead. Consider reviewing data types and padding.

noFieldDetails.title: No Field Analysis Details
noFieldDetails.description: To see detailed analysis for each field, use "Multiple AI Calls" method in configuration.
noFieldDetails.methodBenefit: This method will provide detailed information about:
benefits: Average and maximum size of each field

history.title: Capacity Analysis History
history.description: Review and reuse previous DDL capacity analyses

noHistory.title: No capacity analysis history yet
noHistory.description: Perform DDL capacity analysis to start building history

noResults.title: No matching results found
noResults.description: Try changing search keywords or filters
